---
title: Version 2.0.0-next.0
description: Explore the changelog for storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher version 2.0.0-next.0. Learn about the latest features, bug fixes, and improvements.
releaseUrl: https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/pull/303
releaseDate: June 7, 2025
version: 2.0.0-next.0
---



## storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher@2.0.0-next.0

### Major Changes

-   [#302](https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/pull/302) [`509ca72`](https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/commit/509ca72c8f09be3a038116c5916e1b2cd12e9507) Thanks [@paulbuechner](https://github.com/paulbuechner)! - Upgraded the addon to be compatible with Storybook v9.

    -   Updated required peer dependencies to Storybook v9 layout.

### Minor Changes

-   [#302](https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/pull/302) [`509ca72`](https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/commit/509ca72c8f09be3a038116c5916e1b2cd12e9507) Thanks [@paulbuechner](https://github.com/paulbuechner)! - Updated `@storybook/icons` to version [`1.4.0`]((https://github.com/storybookjs/icons/releases/tag/v1.4.0))
    which includes updated icons.

## storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher@2.0.0-next.0

### Major Changes

-   [#302](https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/pull/302) [`509ca72`](https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/commit/509ca72c8f09be3a038116c5916e1b2cd12e9507) Thanks [@paulbuechner](https://github.com/paulbuechner)! - Upgraded the addon to be compatible with Storybook v9.

    -   Updated required peer dependencies to Storybook v9 layout.

### Minor Changes

-   [#302](https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/pull/302) [`509ca72`](https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/commit/509ca72c8f09be3a038116c5916e1b2cd12e9507) Thanks [@paulbuechner](https://github.com/paulbuechner)! - Updated `@storybook/icons` to version [`1.4.0`]((https://github.com/storybookjs/icons/releases/tag/v1.4.0))
    which includes updated icons.

title: Version 1.0.0
description: Explore the changelog for storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher version 1.0.0. Learn about the latest features, bug fixes, and improvements.
releaseUrl: https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/releases/tag/v1.0.0
releaseDate: December 30, 2024
version: 1.0.0
---

## storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher@1.0.0

### Major Changes (**BREAKING**)

Preparations for storybook v9 have been made. Consult the updated documentation [`README`](https://github.com/paulbuechner/storybook-addon-data-theme-switcher/tree/main) for information on how to migrate to this version.

- Updated the addon to use `@storybook/icons` package to render the data theme switch icon, as it otherwise would become deprecated with the release of storybook v9.

- Migrated to new consolidated `initialGlobals` API to define and load the data-themes.
